dmca.title: PinupGlam.com complains of copied photos in blog
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: 

I am writing to request the removal of copyrighted images from a blog page at blogspot.com, which is owned and controlled by Google. These images are owned by myself and my company, P.F.C. Media. Inc. d/b/a PinupFiles.Com & Pinupglam.Com. 

There are 17 images total, all of which bear our company copyright and logo. The location of this blog page is here: 
http://fotzo.blogspot.com/2005/06/danielle-riley.html

All 17 images on this page belong to us and have the
dmca.principal_name: P.F.C. Media. Inc. d/b/a PinupFiles.Com & Pinupglam.Com
